UNC Charlotte Express Portal Theme

University of North Carolina at Charlotte (UNCC) Theme.

Works for the following URLS:
https://my.uncc.edu/*
https://my.charlotte.edu/*
https://selfservice.uncc.edu/*
https://selfservice.charlotte.edu/*

- Update 1.0 -
